name: CaveRunner (Pharaoh439)
description:
Steal stolen stuff from the local goblins, then sell it all back to its original owners for a profit! Make enough money that you can retire.

A 7 Day 2023 RogueLike submission. Programmed using Godot, in under 7 days.

  • Every level is procedurally generated and populated.
  • The parameters change as you progress to make things more difficult.
  • Starting at one end of the level, make your way to the exit at the other end. Pick up as much valuable stuff as you can hold.
  • Don't take too much time, or the goblins will return home and hunt you down.
  • Take advantage of equipment. Knives will kill enemies instantly, but they can only be used once before breaking. (It's a lore thing.) Blockades can prevent goblins from reaching you.
  • Be careful not to get stuck in a cave! If you're carrying too much, you might not be able to escape.

A Note for MacOS users: This game was built on the first release of Godot 4, which has a number of breaking errors with web-based MacOS builds. Please use the downloadable build and let me know if you encounter any issues. I plan on releasing a patch as soon as these issues are resolved.
